# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it's worth more than what others are asking, but I'm willing to make it accessible to you at an exclusive price of $100. This is an opportunity to experience the best without breaking the bank. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
